mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_emp
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_emp (emp_id, emp_code, emp_account,emp_name, emp_password, emp_sex, emp_birthday, emp_live_address, emp_work_address, emp_phone, emp_worktime, emp_salary, emp_email, emp_idcard, emp_bankcode, emp_work_status, emp_marry_status) values (#{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{empLiveAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empWorkAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empWorktime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{empSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{empEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empBankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empWorkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empMarryStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
